actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain provisions of the Natural Gas Act relating to rates and changes shall not apply to persons engaged in the production or gathering and sale but not in the transmission of natural gas.

summary.text: Presents the Congressional finding that it is in the best interest of the consumer and the Nation that the Federal Power Commission cease the regulation of the price of natural gas. Exempts persons engaged in the production or gathering and sale but not in the transmission of natural gas from the rates and charges established for natural gas companies by the Federal Power Commission. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 717a(6), 717c(a), 717d(a))

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain provisions of the Natural Gas Act relating to rates and changes shall not apply to persons engaged in the production or gathering and sale but not in the transmission of natural gas.
